named-query.name: READ_PERSON_BY_FIRST_AND_LAST
named-query.query: SELECT person FROM com.mpower.domain.Person person WHERE (person.firstName = :firstName AND person.lastName = :lastName)

named-query.name: ANALYZE_FOR_LAPSED_DONOR
named-query.query: UPDATE com.mpower.domain.Person person SET person.lapsedDonor = true WHERE person.id NOT IN( SELECT gift.person.id FROM com.mpower.domain.Gift gift WHERE gift.value > 0 AND (gift.transactionDate BETWEEN :beginDate AND :currentDate))
